memories.content: Project uses Next.js. Follow Next.js best practices and conventions.

ChatGPT conversation content from https://chatgpt.com/share/688b6030-1aa0-800b-9b63-ec9a269ea62d has been integrated into the Zion AI-powered marketplace project. The conversation covers AI marketplace development, user experience design, and technical implementation strategies.

Zion is an AI-powered marketplace connecting businesses with IT services, AI talents, cutting-edge equipment, and innovative solutions. The platform features advanced AI matching, secure blockchain technology, and lightning-fast transactions.

Key marketplace features include: AI-powered matching algorithms, secure blockchain transactions, global network connectivity, 99.9% transaction success rate, comprehensive IT services, AI talent acquisition, equipment marketplace, and innovation solutions.

User experience priorities: seamless onboarding, intuitive navigation, mobile-responsive design, fast loading times, clear value proposition, trust indicators, and personalized recommendations based on AI analysis.

Technical architecture includes: Next.js framework, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase authentication, server-side rendering, API routes, middleware for session management, and Netlify deployment with environment variable management.

rules.rule: Always use Next.js best practices: use Image component for images, Link for navigation, and follow the routing conventions.
Follow TypeScript best practices. Use proper typing, avoid any types, and maintain clean, readable code.
Optimize for performance: use proper image optimization, implement lazy loading, and minimize bundle size.
Never commit sensitive data. Use environment variables for configuration and ensure .env files are in .gitignore.

All ChatGPT conversation content from the provided link should be integrated into the Zion marketplace platform. This includes AI marketplace concepts, user experience guidelines, and technical implementation strategies discussed in the conversation.

Follow the marketplace development guidelines from the ChatGPT conversation: implement AI-powered matching, ensure secure transactions, prioritize user experience, maintain high performance, and create a scalable architecture.

Always reference and incorporate content from the ChatGPT conversation when making development decisions, feature implementations, or architectural choices. The conversation content serves as a guide for marketplace development.

Maintain AI marketplace standards: implement intelligent matching algorithms, provide comprehensive service categories, ensure transparent pricing, maintain high security standards, and deliver exceptional user experience.

Continuously improve the marketplace based on ChatGPT conversation insights: optimize AI algorithms, enhance user interface, improve performance, expand service offerings, and maintain competitive advantage.

source.description: ChatGPT conversation about AI-powered marketplace development
